title: World MISSIONS 3/4 Completed
body:
What the heck going down with the missions for world i finish 6 missions and the challenger missions will not say complete 4/4 only 3/4 and there no more mission and its been like that since the first day of theses missions were released!!!!!!

anyone else having this problem????

replies.body: We'll be getting more Worlds missions on Oct 2, so we need to wait until then in order to finish up that 3/4 mission.
Sorry but doesn't that mean that we went a week without missions? Or am I miscalculating. Cause that is highly possible.
Hello, I was under the impression that WORLDs missions are refreshed every week. The first set of missions has a week ish deadline so I assumed it is true for the upcoming missions.
same here not sure why it is like that... {{sticker:sg-janna}}
